Class ReviewDaoJdbc

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codecool.reviewservice.dao.implementation.ReviewDaoJdbc

    ReviewDao

    public class ReviewDaoJdbc
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReviewDao
    This class implements the methods of the RieviewDao interface. The class ReviewDaoJdbc is a singleton.

      • getInstance

        public static ReviewDaoJdbc getInstance()
        This method returns the instance of the ClientDaoJdbc singleton if it already exists. If not it instantiates it and then returns it.
        Returns:
        the instance of class ReviewDaoJdbc

      • add

        public void add(Review reviewModel)
        This method implements the add method of the ReviewDao interface. It is for adding a new record to the Review model in the database. The method takes a Review object as an argument and then executes the query which adds it to the database.
        Specified by:
        add in interface ReviewDao
        Parameters:
        reviewModel - a Review object
        See Also:
        Review

      • remove

        public void remove(int reviewKey)
        This method implements the remove method of the ReviewDao interface. It is for removing a record from the Review model in the database. The method takes a reviewKey as a string as an argument and then executes the query which removes the record with the matching reviewKey from the database.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface ReviewDao
        Parameters:
        reviewKey - an unique hash belongs to every Review record in the database, this is the reviewKey

      • getByClientID

        public java.util.ArrayList<Review> getByClientID(int clientID)
        This method implements the getByClientID method of the ReviewDao interface. It is for returning a record from the Review model in the database by taking a client ID as an argument and then executing the query which returns the Review records with the matching client ID from the database.
        Specified by:
        getByClientID in interface ReviewDao
        Parameters:
        clientID - an ID of a client
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Review objects
        See Also:
        Client

        public java.util.ArrayList<Review> getByProductName(java.lang.String productName)
        This method implements the getByProductName method of the ReviewDao interface. It is for returning a record from the Review model in the database by taking a product name as an argument and then executing the query which returns the Review records with the matching product name from the database.
        Specified by:
        getByProductName in interface ReviewDao
        Parameters:

      • getApprovedByProductName

        public java.util.ArrayList<Review> getApprovedByProductName(java.lang.String productName)
        Returns an ArrayList of Review objects. Takes a productName as an argument and returns all the approved reviews of that particular product from all the clients.
        Specified by:
        getApprovedByProductName in interface ReviewDao
        Parameters:
        productName - the name of a product
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Review objects

      • getApprovedByClientId

        public java.util.ArrayList<Review> getApprovedByClientId(int clientID)
        Returns an ArrayList of Review objects. Takes a client ID as an argument and returns all the approved reviews submitted on the client's web page.
        Specified by:
        getApprovedByClientId in interface ReviewDao

      • updateStatus

        public void updateStatus(java.lang.String reviewKey,
                         java.lang.String newStatus)
        This method is used for updating the status if the reviews. The first argument it takes is a review key which is used for finding the actual record in database table, and the second one is the new status we want to set.
        Specified by:
        updateStatus in interface ReviewDao
        Parameters:
        reviewKey - an unique hash belongs to every Review record in the database, this is the reviewKey

      • createReviewModel

        private java.util.ArrayList<Review> createReviewModel(java.lang.String sql)
        Takes an SQL query as an argument. When called it connects to the database, instantiates a Review object, sets it's ID and then returns in an ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        sql - an SQL query as a String
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing the new Review object.
